snippet: Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio and aides are conducting a campaign of diplomacy with influential black and Latino New Yorkers who view William J. Bratton as divisive.
abstract: Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio and aides are conducting campaign of diplomacy with influential black and Latino New Yorkers unsettled by divisive tactics used by William J Bratton during his tenure as Los Angeles police chief in 1990s.

byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and J. DAVID GOODMAN

lead_paragraph: Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio and aides are conducting a campaign of diplomacy with influential black and Latino New Yorkers who view William J. Bratton as divisive.

headline.main: De Blasio Style Evident in Effort to Sway Critics of Bratton
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Style Evident in Effort to Sway Critics of Police
